page = <Page url='https://qa.dployportal.com/InsightDashboard/MetricBowler#'>

    @pytest.mark.regression
    @pytest.mark.action
    @allure.title('Create New Action')
    def test_create_new_metric_action(page: Page):
        action_name = f"Test_auto_Action_{common.unique_num()}"
        MR_name = f"Test_auto_Metric"
    
        with allure.step("Login to Deploy application"):
            login_page.login(page, "chromium")
            allure.attach(page.screenshot(), name="Login", attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.PNG)
    
        with allure.step("Navigate to Metric Action screen"):
            base_code.action_click(page, "xpath", "new_metric_action", "MBID")
            base_code.action_click(page, "xpath", "new_metric_action", "MR_filter_settings")
            base_code.action_click(page, "xpath", "new_metric_action", "MBID_search_icon")
            base_code.action_click(page, "xpath", "new_metric_action", "select_all")
            base_code.action_click(page, "xpath", "new_metric_action", "apply_settings")
            base_code.action_click(page, "xpath", "new_metric_action", "action_agr_button")
            allure.attach(page.screenshot(), name="Metric Action Page", attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.PNG)
    
        with allure.step("New Action fields"):
            base_code.action_click(page, "xpath", "new_metric_action", "create_new_action_button")
            base_code.action_click(page, "xpath", "new_metric_action", "action_M/MR_filter")
            new_action.NewMetricActionPage.enter_value(page,'input_MR_name', MR_name)
            new_action.NewMetricActionPage.action_click(page, "xpath", "new_metric_action", "select_MR")
            new_action.NewMetricActionPage.enter_value(page,'action_title_input', action_name)
